definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Heating coils are used to heat flasks and other containers.
sentences.chinese: 加熱盤管可以用於加熱燒瓶及其它容器。

sentences.english: A vial or round long - necked vessel for laboratory use.
sentences.chinese: 燒瓶實驗用的一種小瓶或長頸容器。

sentences.english: Hails of bottles and bricks were intermittently thrown at police from side streets as reinforcements arrived.
sentences.chinese: 增援的警察到達時從人羣中飛出大量的磚頭和燃燒瓶。

sentences.english: Make your own sandwiches, refill your water or juice bottle, nick your granny's flask and make your own coffee for lectures.
sentences.chinese: 自制三明治，自帶水，偷你祖母的燒瓶來煮課上咖啡。

sentences.english: However, the self-made explosives failed to prevent the demolition.
sentences.chinese: 但這些燃燒瓶卻沒有成功阻止拆遷。

sentences.english: Usually it is put on a round- bottomed flask or several neck flasks.
sentences.chinese: 通常它連接一個圓底燒瓶或一些長頸瓶。

sentences.english: A round-bottomed flask is used for a lot of reactions.
sentences.chinese: 圓底燒瓶用於許多化學反應。
